message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a chance to purchase my product for $18,000. I believe this product would be highly valuable to you, but I am open to discussing the price further if needed.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the value I can get out of it.
Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your perspective on the price. Considering the true value of this product, I could come down to $16,000. This feels like a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $16,000. I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $14,000. That's the highest I'm willing to go.
